Author: Mpamaegbu
Body: Even the telegram group has disappeared. I opened mine to follow up on the March 1st hype this morning. Just a click to open it and the link went off. I can't even get the link on any of their threads anymore. Even the viox site is down. What a way to scam and this is why I always advise against buying into ICOs. Wait and let the ICO end and the coin listed before buying in. I learnt my lesson from Hextracoin and Westerncoin.   Quote from: Vionex on November 28, 2017, 01:37:40 PM Dear community, supporter, interested and friends, we announce with pride that you can join now our Telegram channel. https://t.me/VionexInfo Now you can also check our notifications, renewals and updates on the way.  That link has stopped working. This is a pure scam and the idiot who is the OP deserves a death ish. I won't be surprised if this thread is deleted or locked up too to cover their trail.

Author: Vionex
Body: Dear Community,  Now it is time for our Announcement!  We wanted to tell you with pleasure that we are getting listed on two exchanges 1st March 2018!!!  Your VIOX won't be locked and will be tradable from the 1st March 2018 20:00 (GMT).  For contractual reasons we will announce 28th Feb. 2018 16:00 (GMT) on which exchanges VIOX will be listed.  Ultimately, we've teamed up with a company that will help us to produce our hardware.  For contractual reasons this will be published the 28th Feb. 2018 16:00 (GMT), too.  We can only tell you one thing: We discussed whether VAMSUNG, VENOVO, VP or VSI should help us with the development of our hardware.  Who it will be, you will see on 28th Feb. 2018 16:00 (GMT).  We thank you very much for your attention and your support!!!  Let the last week of our ICO begin!

Author: Vionex
Body: Dear Community,  We already announced that we will publish some great news. We have enough tense you to the torture.  Now it's time to know for our investors, supporter and Vionex interested that: ALL UNSOLD TOKENS WILL BE BURNED!!! Our max supply of 100.000.000 VIOX will change after the ICO!  We reserve: - 2.000.000 VIOX for Bountys and Airdrops -10.000.000 VIOX retained by Vionex for the Team -10.000.000 VIOX further Development -10.000.000 VIOX Reserve - Sold Tokens The rest will be burned!  Circulating supply will be the sold tokens and those we distributed for bountys and airdrops!  The next Milestone for us is to reach 5 Million USD!!! This is very important for us to enable new features!  We thank our investors and supporter! You made this happen!!!

Body: The bad news for all investors. By the end of token sale you sell about 8-10 million tokens. Just burn ALL parts by 85%. - 300.000 VIOX for Bountys and Airdrops -1.500.000 VIOX retained by Vionex for the Team -1.500.000 VIOX further Development -1.500.000 VIOX Reserve  It will be honest. Author: Vionex
Body: Dear World! Vionex is now live with very good news!  First of all check the updated whitepaper, FAQs and our website! www.vionex.io It's now official: Vionex is now compatible with your SmartTV! No more remote controls, just do it like Nike with your Smartphone, Tablet or Vionex Hardware. More efficient, easier to use and one medium takes the task of several remote controls!  Second, check our new press releases on: https://bitscreener.com/press-release/vionex-blockchain-based-smarthome-system https://www.fxempire.com/crypto/ico/vionex https://www.icoglory.com/ico/vionex  Third, we got over 20.000 views on bitcointalk now and we cracked the 500 follower mark on twitter!!! https://twitter.com/VionexInfo We are reaching more and more people all around the world and we getting more and more attention!  Finally, we are in negotiation with big exchanges! Soon we will publish BLOCKBUSTER News, about where we get listed after ICO.  Thank you people for your support, thank all those who made this happen!  King Regards, Your Vionex Team

But if worst case happens and we do not reach our soft cap then the investors get their investment back. This is how you can read it in our Terms and Conditions. I hope we could help you out!  Best Regards, Your Vionex Team

Author: TimeTeller
Body: What's the advantage of this token over just installing the smart home app in your phone/gadget? If I'm not a crypto enthusiast or I don't know anything about blockchain, it is more convenient for me to just install the app in my gadgets. Less complications. So need more convincing strategy for your potential customers.

Author: Vionex
Body: Dear TimeTeller, we thank you very much for your interest. Firstly, the benefits of our token are that you can purchase Vionex products at a lower cost with VIOX, which we want to enable standarization in SmartHome modernization. You can also buy our products with BTC, ETH and fiat currencies, but then you pay the full price. Secondly, our customers get VIOX for promotion and loyalty. Thirdly, we also have offerings where people can get VIOX for feedback rewards. Last but not least, we always do our best to improve ourselves. There are improvements and renewals of Vionex coming. More information will follow in the near future. Please follow our website www.vionex.io and our twitter https://twitter.com/VionexInfo to be up to date.
